attributes.action: Raise the age for any person qualifying for a full driving license to the age of 21yrs which will include all visitors to Great Britain but exclude members of our armed forces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is becoming more obvious that under 21's are generally not life experienced enough to drive a motor vehicle sensibly,having little due regard to fellow human beings at all times and wanting to experiment with speed, risk taking etc..... There are now too many motor vehicles on the road to absorb irresponsible drivers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
